blocks.innerHtml: In Game Maker Toolkit's 2024 Game Jam, I made a game called "Scaled to Nothing". I've been learning the Godot game engine (and GDScript), in my spare time for around a year, so I thought I was at the point where I could try entering my first game jam. I could only spare the weekend for this four-day jam, and I chose to work by myself! I created a "How I Made" video that you can watch below, or at the link above which covers the journey more in-depth.

<iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VLym-hQ_e0c?si=vng9bDkOUrsLCzTd" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
I was also very happy with the results (with over 7,000 entries), which are shown below and can be seen on itch.io: itch.io/jam/gmtk-2024/rate/2904792.
